name: Mya's Big Bird Adventure
description:
Log Line
Mya battles the monstrous servants of the Aviform System, a virus transmitted via knowledge, with the help of Unit A, a nice bird!

Content Warnings
Cartoon violence/blood/death, disturbing medical devices and situations, use of syringes (no visible needles), strong language, flashing lights.  I'd give it a PG-13 at most? 🤷🏻‍♂️

Team Members
warnerburg (Paul Warner)

Contains an excerpt from PAINWANTKILLALLFLESH by techtheist (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/techtheist/fma2021-part-2/creep-demolition-painwantkillallflesh/) - licensed under an Attribution 4.0 International License.  I modified the excerpt with a fade-in/fade-out effect.
